power.title: Blazing Pursuit
power.fluff: You envelop your weapon in fire and then strike, the flames creating a lingering path that you can travel along to catch your escaping foe
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Intelligence vs. AC and Will
true Hit (AC): 2[W] + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

Hit (Will): If the target is within 5 squares of you at the end of its next turn, you can use a free reaction to teleport to a space that is adjacent to the target. You do not need line of sight to the target or the space you teleport into.

1 Aegis of Assault: You can teleport if the target is within a number of squares equal to 3 + your Strength modifier (minimum 5 squares) instead. You can add the increased distance from your Aegis of Assault class feature to this distance.

power.title: Chilling Blow
power.fluff: Your weapon rips into your foe and cold pulses from the wound, enveloping your enemy's body in a crust of frost
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Intelligence vs. AC and Fortitude
true Hit (AC): 1[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage.
Hit (Fortitude): Until the start of your next turn, the target takes cold damage each time it makes an attack. The cold damage equals your Constitution modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
1 Critical: The target also takes the damage the first time it falls prone or willingly moves before the start of your next turn.

power.title: Crackling Burst
power.fluff: Your weapon sends out sprawling arcs of lightning that catch nearby enemies, making movement agonizing for them
power.section: Attack: Close burst 2 each enemy in the burst Intelligence vs. Reflex
true Hit: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

true The first time the target willingly moves before the start of your next turn, it takes lightning damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. This effect ends if you are no longer within 2 squares of the target, unless the target is marked by you.

Miss: If the target is marked by you, the first time it willingly moves before the start of your ext turn, it takes lightning damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Dimensional Cleave
power.fluff: Your weapon is ready and waiting for a teleporting enemy
power.section: Trigger: An enemy teleports or is teleported to a space within your reach
Attack: Melee weapon the triggering enemy Intelligence vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.
true 1 Aegis of Ensnarement: If the target willingly teleported, the attack deals additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Falcon's Mark
power.fluff: You send your weapon flying to seek out an enemy beyond your normal reach, using your magic to mark it as your foe
power.section: Attack: Ranged 5 Ranged weapon +2/+5 if your weapon can be thrown one creature Intelligence vs. AC and Will
true Hit (AC): 1[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage, or 2[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage if your bonded weapon can normally be thrown.
Hit (Will): The target is marked by you until the end of your next turn.
1 Arcane Aegis: The target is marked by your arcane aegis.
1 If you already have another creature marked by you arcane aegis, both remain marked until the end of your next turn, at which point you decide which remains marked by your aegis.
true Effect: Your weapon returns to your hand.

power.title: Flame Cyclone
power.fluff: Arcane power swirls around your weapon and outward toward your enemies, engulfing them in an inferno
power.section: Attack: Close wave 3 each creature in the wave Intelligence vs. Reflex
true Hit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, or 2d8 + Intelligence modifier fire damage against a creature marked by you.
Miss: Your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus fire damage against a creature marked by you.

power.title: Foesnare
power.fluff: You cut into your foe, and links of solid eldritch energy appear to bind it to the ground
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Intelligence vs. AC and Fortitude
true Hit (AC): 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.
Hit (Fortitude): The target is chained until the end of your next turn. The effect immediately ends after the target leaves its space.
While chained, the target is immobilized and reduces all forced movement against it by 3 squares, and any teleportation by 1 square.
Once while the target is chained, you can use the following action:

1 Opportunity Interrupt: Trigger: The target is pushed, pulled, or slid; The target's reduction against forced movement from this attack doesn't apply against the triggering push, pull or slide, and the effect does not end after the target leaves its space.

power.title: Fox's Feint
power.fluff: Your blade dances faster than the eye can follow, creating a small disruption that affects you and your target
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Intelligence vs. Will and AC
1 You can choose in which order you want to resolve the hits
true Hit (AC): 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.
Hit (Will): You and the target teleport, swapping positions.
1 Critical: The target grants combat advantage until the start of your next turn.
If one target has a larger space than the other, you choose where inside the larger space the smaller target teleports and which part of the larger target's space covers the smaller space.

power.title: Lightning Clash
power.fluff: As your blade strikes home, a sizzling bolt of lightning leaps from your reeling foe towards its nearby ally
power.section: Primary Attack: Melee weapon one creature Intelligence vs. AC and Reflex
true Hit (AC): 1[W] + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.
Hit (Reflex): You make the Leaping Lightning attack, using the target's space as the origin. This attack does not trigger reactive strikes for making a ranged attack.

part.section: Lightning Attack: Ranged 5/10 one creature other than the primary target Intelligence vs. Reflex
true Hit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.
Miss:Half damage if the primary attack was a critical hit.

power.title: Sword of Sigils
power.fluff: As you sweet your blade in a wide arc, it glows red and leaves arcane runes burning in the air above your foes
power.section: Attack: Close weapon burst each enemy in the burst Intelligence vs. AC and Will
true Hit (AC): 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.
true 1 Arcane Aegis: The target counts as being marked by your arcane aegis class power.

Hit (Will): Until the end of your next turn, if the target makes an attack that does not include you as a target, it takes force damage after the attack is resolved. The force damage equals your Intelligence modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
1 Critical: The force damage increases by 2 + your Intelligence modifier + twice your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Thundering Blow
power.fluff: The strike of your weapon resounds like thunder, knocking your foe back
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Intelligence vs. AC and Fortitude
true Hit (AC): 2[W] + Intelligence modifier thunder damage.
Hit (Fortitude): The target is deafened until the end of your next turn, and you push it up to 3 squares.
1 Critical: The target is knocked prone.
